about.p: Learn a little more about me, my career, and my goals.

howStarted.title: How did it all begin?
howStarted.text: My interest in programming began in 2018, when I took a technical course in Systems Analysis and Development and had my first contact with web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

myExperiences.title: My experiences
myExperiences.text: I have been working professionally since 2020, accumulating five years of experience. I have worked as a back-end, front-end, and full-stack developer, as well as a systems analyst, and have also worked as a freelancer. During this period, I have gathered requirements, implemented new features, refactored code, fixed bugs, and created entire ecosystems (web, APIs, and mobile). Therefore, I can work as a junior and feel confident enough to work as a full-stack developer.

whyProgramming.title: Why programming?
whyProgramming.text: I chose to pursue a career in development because I enjoy transforming ideas into real projects, automating processes, creating valuable brands, solving problems through technology, and contributing to the community at large.

mainStack.title: Main stack
mainStack.text: I chose Javascript as my main technology because it allows me to meet any request or demand, such as creating a robust, secure, and scalable API with Node.js, creating a modern, functional, and complete website with React, and delivering a current, high-performance, multi-platform application with React Native. The only limit is your imagination.

myUniqueAdvantage.title: What makes me unique?
myUniqueAdvantage.text: I would say that what sets me apart is that I am studious and persistent. Since I first learned about this field, I have never stopped studying, even when I was working. I started with free courses on YouTube and other platforms, but I have also invested in paid courses to become more professional and, above all, to specialize in the technologies I already know. I believe that complacency is what disqualifies a professional from the job market over time.

myGoal.title: My goal
myGoal.text: My goal is to become a reference within a community or company, and help as many people as I can, helping them get their ideas off the ground and turn their dreams/businesses into reality through my technical knowledge. I would also like, in the future, to advise and assist people who will go through the difficulties I went through when I was starting my career.
